field.title: URL under which a public certificate can be viewed on the OiRA community site
field.description: The URL shown to the end-user will be something like https://oiraproject.eu/fr/certificates?id=1234 . The language, view name (certificates) and id will be generated automatically. Just put here the URL of the site.
